name: MEAT (Haley Nelson)
description:
Made as a prototype for class made in the span of two weeks. 

Meat is flying everywhere! Quick hit it before it falls in the pot. Blast it! Blow up chicken legs with a rocket launcher. Juggle bacon and steak with pistols. Everyone knows the best way to handle meat is to shoot it. Exploding meat offers a myriad of ways to cook.

Team Exploding Meat: Jackson Laumann, Haley Nelson, Adam Field, Luke Hensley, Jacob Gleize
